name: Critter Ball Boom
description:
Critter Ball Boom is a team-based competitive party game, where teams work together to collect the most trophies and come out on top!

In the main game mode, players work in teams of two and take turns to be the first team to successfully manoeuvre all obstacles and reach the end goal of a stage.

What are the controls?
Gamepad controls:
Gamepad controls can be found in the main menu.
Keyboard controls:
WASD to aim in Striking Mode and move in Rolling Mode
SPACE to fire in striking mode and hop in Rolling Mode
LOOK via mouse cursor
Menus operated via mouse input

How does it work? 
Solo Play:
Launch and guide your ball through the air to the goal before the other players!
Duo Play:
One player launches the other through the air, where it becomes the second player's opportunity to steer themselves towards the end goal. 

Don't get knocked off-course by obstacles and act quick!
